import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import "./tour-card.css" const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id, title, city, photo, price, featured, reviews }=tour const totalRating = reviews?.reduce((acc)) return (
{featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating} {" "} ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price}/per person
) } export default TourCard
